description:
Learn to configure three essential Microsoft services for any organization
running Windows Server 2012: file sharing, printers, and remote server
management. Timothy Pintello shows how to install and configure these services
in a virtual network environment, using VirtualBoxâ€”a setup you can easily
replicate and practice with on your own. He also spends a chapter diving into
Windows permissions. If you're coming from a Mac environment or just starting
out in IT administration, this course will help you take the next crucial step
in setting up Windows Server at your organization.
title: Configuring Basic Microsoft Services
